TRANSGENDERISM.Definition: the condition of identifying as a gender different from the one identified at birth

STICK TO.Definition: continue doing that and only that

IS OUT OF HER DEPTH.Definition: does not understand some things well enough

EMPLOYMENT TRIBUNAL.Definition: a special court for job-related cases

INCOMPATIBLE.Definition: not able to exist or work together

WADING INTO.Definition: getting involved (in a difficult or controversial situation)

MARGINALISED.Definition: pushed to the edge of society

TRANSITION.Definition: change from one state to another

SYMPATHY.Definition: understanding and caring about their suffering

ARTICULATE.Definition: clearly expressed and easy to understand

SYMPATHETIC.Definition: showing understanding and care for their problems

TRANSPHOBIC.Definition: having a dislike or prejudice against transgender people

VEHEMENTLY.Definition: in a forceful or intense manner

HATE CRIME.Definition: a crime motivated by prejudice or intolerance toward a person or group

HATE SPEECH.Definition: speech that attacks or discriminates against a particular group

EAGERLY.Definition: with a lot of interest or enthusiasm

EGGING THE SCOTTISH GOVERNMENT ON.Definition: encouraging or provoking the scottish government

THUD.Definition: a dull, heavy sound (used metaphorically here for a sudden realisation)

VOICE OF REASON.Definition: a person who spoke sensibly and calmly

PARIAH.Definition: an outcast, someone who was rejected by society
